# 현재 비활성화 처리 해요!
name: PR Test
on:
  pull_request:
    branches-ignore:
      - main
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-20.04

    services:
      redis:
        image: redis
        ports:
          - 6379:6379
        options: --entrypoint redis-server

    steps:
      - name: Checkout source code.
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v2
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'adopt'

      - name: Run Tests and Build
        run: ./gradlew build --info

      - name: List JAR files
        run: |
          ls -la build/libs/

      - name: Upload JAR as artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v2
        with:
          name: content-jar
          path: build/libs/content-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar
